name: Strawberry Limeade
description: This strawberry limeade is a little sweet and a little sour with fresh strawberry puree in the mix. Use fresh lime juice and the sweetest strawberries you can find. It is the perfect summer drink for adults and kids.
directions: Use fresh lime juice and the sweetest strawberries you can find.
To make the syrup, combine the sugar and water in a saucepan
Cook over medium high heat for 5-10 minutes until the sugar is dissolved and the liquid is clear.
In a large mason jar or a pitcher, combine the lime juice, simple syrup, strawberries, mint, and water.
Put it in the refrigerator for 2-3 hours
